attributes.action: Enact legislation to make Investment Bankers personally liable for losses incurred through their own recklessness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has become apparent that the underlying cause of the banking crisis was due to reckless gambling on the part of investment bankers, driven solely by the desire to maximise profits and so their own bonuses.
Such recklessness can only be curbed by making them, rather than the UK Taxpayer, personally liable for all such losses
